summary: This is an email chain from October 24, 2019, discussing a voicemail left by attorney Stacey Richman regarding her client Mark Epstein. The correspondents are coordinating who should respond, with speculation that the contact may be related to a death investigation.

persons.name: Stacey Richman
persons.context: Attorney who left voicemails regarding her client Mark Epstein. The correspondents are deciding who should return her call.

persons.name: Mark Epstein
persons.context: Client of attorney Stacey Richman. The reason for the attorney's contact is being discussed, with speculation it may relate to a death investigation.

connections.description: Stacey Richman is identified as the attorney for Mark Epstein, as she is contacting others on his behalf.

events.title: Coordination on Attorney Contact
events.description: Email chain discusses voicemails left by attorney Stacey Richman regarding her client Mark Epstein, with speculation the contact may be related to a death investigation.

keyFacts: Attorney Stacey Richman was attempting to contact individuals regarding her client Mark Epstein in October 2019.
The correspondence speculates that Richman's contact may be 'in connection with the death investigation'.
The email chain shows coordination among recipients about who should respond to the attorney's inquiry.
